entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
